name: RDC Design Group
tagline: INNOVATIVE SOLUTIONS TO YOUR DESIGN NEEDS.
description:
RDC Design Group specializes in fresh and inspiring creative services including graphic design, web development, and 2D / 3D animation. RDC has built a solid relationship with clients through our knowledge of web 2.0 and our proven social media marketing techniques. RDC Design group offers two core competencies. The first is making an organization look good on the Web. If you don’t have a Web site – we’ll build it. If you already have one – we’ll make it better.
The other thing we do is Internet marketing. Once a Web presence has been established, RDC offers incredible programs to drive traffic to your organization or business. And whether its design or marketing – We think you’ll be pleased with the affordability of our services. Whether your interest is a new logo or a revamped website to establish your identity, a custom illustration to improve a brochure or animation to bring an idea to life, our mission is to get you noticed. Along with our passion, our commended artistic and computer aided design skills and our use of the latest in software technology, RDC’s business model offers the highest quality work for less.
